cmput301.f13t01.createyourownadventure

Class StoryFragmentList

  • java.lang.Object
    • cmput301.f13t01.createyourownadventure.StoryFragmentList
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class StoryFragmentList
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    FragmentList, holds all Fragment objects and gives each a unique ID. Every Story object should have one of these.
    Author:
    Jesse Chu
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

        public StoryFragmentList()

    • Method Detail

      • getFragment

        public StoryFragment getFragment(java.lang.Integer id)
        Returns requested Fragment from FragmentList. Bad request returns null.
        Parameters:
        id - ID of requested Fragment
        Returns:
        the Fragment associated with the given ID, null if it doesn't exist

      • getFragmentId

        public java.lang.Integer getFragmentId(StoryFragment fragment)
        Returns the ID of a given StoryFragment.
        Parameters:
        fragment - the StoryFragment to get the ID of
        Returns:
        the ID of the StoryFragment, null if not found

      • getFragmentInfo

        public StoryFragmentInfo getFragmentInfo(java.lang.Integer id)
        Returns a StoryFragmentInfo object for the given ID. Used to display StoryFragmentInfo in lists.
        Parameters:
        id - the ID of the fragment to get the info of
        Returns:
        a StoryFragmentInfo object for that ID

      • getFragmentInfoList

        public java.util.ArrayList<StoryFragmentInfo> getFragmentInfoList()
        Returns an ArrayList of StoryFragmentInfo objects for all StoryFragment objects.
        Returns:
        an ArrayList of all StoryFragmentInfo

      • addFragment

        public java.lang.Integer addFragment(StoryFragment newFragment)
        Places a new fragment into the FragmentList. A new ID is automatically generated for each fragment.
        Parameters:
        newFragment - The StoryFragment to add to StoryFragmentList
        Returns:
        the ID given to the added StoryFragment

      • removeFragment

        public boolean removeFragment(java.lang.Integer id)
        Removes a requested Fragment from the FragmentList. Returns boolean based on success/failure.
        Parameters:
        id - ID of the Fragment to remove
        Returns:
        true if successful, false otherwise

      • updateFragment

        public boolean updateFragment(java.lang.Integer id,
                     StoryFragment fragment)
        Updates the Fragment associated with a given ID. Fragment ID must have been in use to be valid
        Parameters:
        id - ID of the Fragment in to updated
        fragment - Fragment to update to
